properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 3:44PM EST until February 14 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches.

* WHERE...Mason, Oceana and Muskegon counties.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Bands of lake effect
snow will move inland tonight and create low visibility and
slippery roads.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for abrupt changes in
visibility and driving conditions tonight into Friday morning
due to intense lake effect snow bands. The snow will not
significantly add up due to small flake size, but travel impacts
will certainly be felt. The evening commute along the lakeshore
will be affected in spots, as will the Friday morning commute.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST FRIDAY
